name: isHeroMode
description: If true, enables hero-mode styling for the slide (larger text, special layout, etc).

name: alignment
description: Horizontal alignment of the text ("left", "center", "right").

name: openInNewTab
description: If true, opens the link in a new browser tab/window.

name: linkedin
description: Represents the LinkedIn platform.

name: textTransform
description: Text transform style (e.g., "uppercase", "capitalize", "none").

name: styles
description: Optional map of inline styles for this block, for live editing and CSS export. Uses camelCase keys (React style). For export, convert to kebab-case.

name: onMouseEnter
description: Triggered when the mouse enters the block (used for hover effects or ref tracking).

name: heading
description: Represents a heading block type.

name: fontWeight
description: Font weight (e.g., "700" for bold, "400" for normal).

name: selector
description: Unique CSS selector for targeting this element (e.g. "d2d-hero-header-[slideKey]").

name: rowGap
description: Vertical gap above and below the ColumnsBlock (to its siblings). Maps to CSS `margin-top` and `margin-bottom`.

name: slideImage
description: The main image displayed in the slide. See ISlideImage for structure and options.

name: selector
description: Unique CSS selector for targeting this element (e.g., "d2d-hero-cta-[slideKey]").

name: isEditing
description: If true, block is actively being edited (used to show focus, border highlights).

name: showArrows
description: Whether to show left/right navigation arrows.

name: github
description: Represents the GitHub platform.

name: IHeadingBlockData
description: Data model for heading blocks.

name: styles
description: Optional map of inline styles for this block, for live editing and CSS export. Uses camelCase keys (React style). For export, convert to kebab-case.

name: letterSpacing
description: Letter spacing for the heading text. Example: { value: "0.05", unit: "em" }.

name: color
description: Text color as hex/rgb string (e.g., "#fff" or "rgba(0,0,0,0.8)").

name: fontFamily
description: Font family for the button text. Example: "Inter", "Arial", "sans-serif".

name: designBlockId
description: Unique identifier for the rendered block.

name: loop
description: Whether the slider should loop back to the start after the last slide.

name: IDividerBlockData
description: Data model for divider blocks.

name: blockType
description: The type of block (e.g. "text", "heading", "image", "columns", etc.). Determines which blockData and UI variant is used.

name: html
description: HTML content for the heading (can include inline formatting). Example: <span style='color: red;'>Welcome</span>.

name: fontSize
description: Font size of the heading. Example: { value: "2", unit: "rem" }.

name: fontSize
description: Font size of the text. Example: { value: "1", unit: "rem" }.

name: hoverBackgroundColor
description: Background color on hover (hex code). Maps to CSS `background-color` (hover state).

name: alt
description: Alternate text for the image (for accessibility and SEO). Example: "Fitness instructor in gym".

name: margin
description: Margin outside the button, per side. Controls space from surrounding blocks (see IFourSideField).

name: text
description: The text content to display (header or text body).

name: url
description: The URL, mailto, or phone value (e.g., "mailto:...").

name: lineHeight
description: Line height as a dimension object (e.g., { value: "2", unit: "rem" }).

name: isDragging
description: If true, block is currently being dragged (affects styling).

name: url
description: Video source URL. Can be a direct link or an embed (e.g., YouTube, Vimeo). Example: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=abcd1234".

name: textDecoration
description: Text decoration for the heading (e.g., "underline", "none"). Maps to CSS `text-decoration`.

name: columnWidths
description: Optional array of relative widths for each column cell (as decimals). The sum typically should be 1.0.

name: isHovered
description: If true, block is currently hovered by mouse (affects handle visibility).

name: isDragPreview
description: If true, we render the background as white.

name: socials
description: Represents a socials/sharing block type.

name: imageFit
description: How the image should fit within its bounding box. Maps to CSS "object-fit". Options: "contain", "cover", "fill", "none", "scale-down".

name: ISocialsBlockData
description: Data model for socials/sharing blocks.

name: fontSize
description: Font size as a dimension object (e.g., { value: "1.5", unit: "rem" }).

name: autoplayInterval
description: Autoplay interval in milliseconds (ms). Example: 5000 for 5 seconds per slide.

name: backgroundColor
description: Button background color (hex code). Maps to CSS `background-color`.

name: label
description: Optional accessible label for screen readers. Example: "Follow us on Twitter".

name: socials
description: Ordered array of active social icons to display. Each icon/link is defined by ISocialIconConfig.

name: actionType
description: The type of action this button triggers: "url" for web links, "email" for mailto, "phone" for tel links, custom strings allowed for extensibility.

name: cellRadius
description: Border radius for each column cell (per corner). Maps to CSS `border-radius`.

name: alignment
description: Horizontal alignment of the row of icons. One of "left", "center", or "right".

name: alignment
description: Horizontal alignment of the image within its container. One of "left", "center", or "right". Maps to CSS alignment.

name: onDelete
description: Optional handler to trigger deletion of this block.

name: html
description: Represents a custom HTML block type.

name: styles
description: Optional map of inline styles for this block, for live editing and CSS export. Uses camelCase keys (React style). For export, convert to kebab-case.

name: textDecoration
description: Text decoration style (e.g., "underline", "none").

name: letterSpacing
description: Letter spacing as a dimension object (e.g., { value: "0.04", unit: "em" }).

name: contentBlockRef
description: React ref to the active DOM element for this block. Used for focus management, drag/drop, and toolbars. May be null if not mounted.

name: hero_slider
description: Represents a hero slider block type.

name: ITextBlockData
description: Data model for text blocks.

name: fontWeight
description: Font weight for the text (string or numeric). Example: "500".

name: description
description: Optional description for the image (metadata or accessibility).

name: imageFit
description: How the image should fit within its slide container. Maps to CSS "object-fit". Options: "contain", "cover", "fill", "none", "scale-down".

name: height
description: Overall height of the slider. Example: { value: "400", unit: "px" }.

name: IImageBlockData
description: Data model for image blocks.

name: spacing
description: Spacing (gap) between icons, in pixels.

name: padding
description: Padding around the video (see IDimensionField). Controls the space between the video and its container. Example: { value: "16", unit: "px" }.

name: borderWidth
description: Border width for the button. Example: { value: "2", unit: "px" }.

name: whatsapp
description: Represents the WhatsApp platform.

name: borderRadius
description: Border radius for the slider container. Example: { value: "12", unit: "px" }.

name: borderRadius
description: Border radius for the image (per corner). Controls rounding (see IFourCornersField). Example: { topLeft: "8", ... }.

name: youtube
description: Represents the YouTube platform.

name: children
description: The content component (e.g. HeadingBlock, TextBlock) rendered inside this wrapper.

name: cellMargin
description: Margin outside each column cell. Controls space between each cell and its neighbors.

name: text
description: Represents a text block type.

name: indicatorStyle
description: Style of the indicator controls. Options: "dots", "rectangles", "numbers" (reserved for future expansion).

name: alignment
description: Horizontal alignment relative to the parent container. One of "left", "center", "right", or custom. Maps to CSS alignment.

name: colContentBlockId
description: A new payload value is needed when dragging a DesignBlock from ColumnCell to DesignCanvas.

name: caption
description: Optional caption shown below the image.

name: children
description: 2D array of DesignBlocks, representing the content of each column/cell. Each sub-array corresponds to a column and contains its stacked blocks.

name: openInNewTab
description: If true, opens the URL in a new tab or window. Maps to target="_blank".

name: selector
description: Optional custom selector/class name for theming or CSS export. Example: ".d2d-buttons" or ".f45-heading".

name: onDragStart
description: Called when the drag operation begins — passes the block's ID.

name: image
description: Represents an image block type.

name: borderColor
description: Border color for the button (hex code). Maps to CSS `border-color`.

name: width
description: Image width (with unit). Example: { value: "100", unit: "%" } for full width.

name: alignment
description: Horizontal alignment of the text block. One of "left", "center", or "right". Maps to CSS "text-align".

name: instagram
description: Represents the Instagram platform.

name: padding
description: Padding around the rendered HTML content (see IDimensionField). Controls the space between the custom HTML and the block’s outer edge. Example: { value: "16", unit: "px" }.

name: onHover
description: Optional handler fired when another block is dragged over this block. Used by DesignCanvas or ColumnCell to track potential drop targets.

name: padding
description: Padding for each side, supporting linked/unlinked config.

name: color
description: Text color (hex code). Example: "#212121".

name: columns
description: Represents a columns block type.

name: IHtmlBlockData
description: Data model for custom HTML blocks.

name: facebook
description: Represents the Facebook platform.

name: fontFamily
description: Font family for the heading. Example: "Inter, sans-serif".

name: padding
description: Padding inside the divider block, per side (see IFourSideField). Controls space between the line and the block's edges.

name: backgroundColor
description: Background color of the slider (CSS color string). Example: "#f8fafc".

name: width
description: Overall button width (auto, px, %, etc). Example: { value: "auto", unit: "" }.

name: actionType
description: The type of action when the image is clicked: "url" (navigate to a link), "email" (mailto), "phone" (tel), or custom string for future use.

name: custom
description: Represents a custom or future platform.

name: iconSize
description: Icon size in pixels. Controls width and height of each icon.

name: iconShape
description: Visual shape of the icons. "circle" for round icons, "square" for square icons.

name: hoverColor
description: Text color on hover (hex code). Maps to CSS `color` (hover state).

name: borderRadius
description: Border radius for the button, per corner. Controls rounding (see IFourCornersField).

name: borderStyle
description: Border style for the button. One of "solid", "dashed", "dotted", "none", or custom. Maps to CSS `border-style`.

name: selector
description: Custom selector/class for styling or targeting this image.

name: autoplay
description: Whether the slider should auto-advance.

name: textTransform
description: Text transform for the text (e.g., "uppercase", "capitalize", "none"). Maps to CSS "text-transform".

name: textTransform
description: Text transform for the heading (e.g., "uppercase", "capitalize", "none"). Maps to CSS `text-transform`.

name: color
description: Color of the divider line (CSS color string). Example: "#d1d5db".

name: columnWidths
description: Array of relative widths for each column cell, as decimals. The sum should typically be 1.0 (e.g., [0.5, 0.5] for two equal columns). Used to set CSS grid/flex basis or width percentages.

name: IHeroSliderBlockData
description: Data model for hero slider blocks.

name: heroHeader
description: Main hero headline text or rich content. See IHeroContent for structure.

name: children
description: 2D array of IContentBlock. Each sub-array corresponds to a column and contains its stacked content blocks.

name: IColumnsBlockData
description: Data model for columns blocks.

name: height
description: Height/thickness of the divider line (see IDimensionField). Example: { value: "2", unit: "px" }.

name: blockContext
description: Context from where this block originates (e.g. "canvas" | "columns").

name: blockData
description: Block-specific data. The structure depends on blockType. For example: HeadingBlockData, TextBlockData, ColumnsBlockData, etc.

name: divider
description: Represents a divider block type.

name: cellPadding
description: Padding inside each column cell. Controls space between the edge of the cell and its content.

name: twitter
description: Represents the Twitter platform.

name: margins
description: Margin outside the divider block, per side (see IFourSideField). Controls spacing between this divider and other blocks.

name: padding
description: Padding inside the button, per side. Controls space around the label (see IFourSideField).

name: IVideoBlockData
description: Data model for video blocks.

name: designBlockRef
description: Reference to the actual DOM <div> element representing the block.

name: colIndex
description: Index of the column this block belongs to (only set when used inside a ColumnCell). Used for determining cross-column reordering.

name: textDecoration
description: Text decoration for the text (e.g., "underline", "none"). Maps to CSS "text-decoration".

name: description
description: Optional image description (used for metadata or screen readers).

name: string
description: Custom/extension block type (string).

name: height
description: Image height (with unit). Example: { value: "250", unit: "px" }.

name: alignment
description: Horizontal alignment of the CTA ("left", "center", "right").

name: fontWeight
description: Font weight of the button text (name or numeric). Example: "normal", "semibold", "bold", "500", etc.

name: imagePosition
description: Vertical position of the image within its box (when cropped). Maps to CSS "object-position". Options: "top", "center", "bottom".

name: fontSize
description: Font size of the button text. Example: { value: "16", unit: "px" }.

name: onDragEnd
description: Called when the drag operation ends.

name: cta
description: Call-to-action button or link for the slide. See ICallToAction for structure.

name: video
description: Represents a video block type.

name: fontWeight
description: Font weight for the heading text (string or numeric). Example: "500".

name: lineHeight
description: Line height for the text. Example: { value: "1.5", unit: "" }.

name: letterSpacing
description: Letter spacing for the text. Example: { value: "0.05", unit: "em" }.

name: label
description: The visible label/text displayed on the button.

name: alignment
description: Horizontal alignment of the heading within its block. One of "left", "center", or "right". Maps to CSS `text-align`.

name: target
description: If true, opens the link in a new tab/window (`target="_blank"`).

name: alignment
description: Horizontal alignment of the divider line within its container. One of "left", "center", or "right". Maps to CSS alignment.

name: onMouseLeave
description: Triggered when the mouse leaves the block.

name: lineHeight
description: Line height for the heading text. Example: { value: "1.5", unit: "" }.

name: telegram
description: Represents the Telegram platform.

name: html
description: The raw HTML content to render inside the block. Example: <div style='color: red;'>Custom HTML content</div>.

name: contentBlockId
description: Unique ID to identify each block. UUIDs are preferred for stability and uniqueness.

name: showIndicators
description: Whether to display indicator controls (e.g., dots, rectangles, numbers).

name: html
description: HTML content for the text block. Can include inline formatting (e.g., bold, italics, links). Example: <p>Welcome to <b>PageBuilder</b>!</p>.

name: string
description: Allows raw string payload (legacy or simple text content).

name: color
description: Text color for the heading (hex code). Example: "#ffffff".

name: contentBlock
description: The content block that this DesignBlock will contain.

name: fontFamily
description: Font family to use (e.g., "Inter, sans-serif").

name: alt
description: Alternate text for the image (for accessibility).

name: color
description: Button text color (6-digit hex, e.g. "#ffffff"). Maps to CSS `color`.

name: imagePosition
description: Vertical positioning of the image within its box when cropping occurs. Maps to CSS "object-position". Options: "top", "center", "bottom".

name: caption
description: Optional caption displayed below the image.

name: heroText
description: Supporting hero text/content (e.g., subtitle or description). See IHeroContent for structure.

name: overlayColor
description: Optional overlay color rendered above the image. Supports any valid CSS color (including alpha for opacity). Example: "#00000080" (black, 50% opacity).

name: width
description: Overall width of the slider. Example: { value: "100", unit: "%" }.

name: tiktok
description: Represents the TikTok platform.

name: width
description: Width of the divider line (see IDimensionField). Example: { value: "100", unit: "%" } for full width.

name: url
description: The target URL for the CTA (can be external or internal).

name: lineHeight
description: Line height for the button text. Example: { value: "1.5", unit: "" }.

name: src
description: Image source URL (absolute or relative). Example: "/img/slide1.jpg".

name: slides
description: Array of slide definitions for the slider. Each slide contains its image, overlay, text, and CTA (see IHeroSlide).

name: margin
description: Margin around the image block (per side). Controls spacing between this image and other blocks (see IFourSideField).

name: type
description: The social media platform type. Example: "facebook", "twitter", etc. See SocialType for supported values.

name: margin
description: Margin for each side, supporting linked/unlinked config.

name: src
description: Image source URL (absolute or relative). Example: "/img/banner.jpg".

name: url
description: The URL, mailto, or phone link for the slide image. Example: "https://example.com", "mailto:info@example.com".

name: contentBlock
description: In design mode, every design block will have a content block as well. This helps make mapping DesignBlocks more efficient and reduces designTree lookups.

name: columnGap
description: Horizontal gap between each column cell. Maps to CSS `column-gap` or `gap`.

name: headingLevel
description: Heading level, as a number (1–6). Determines whether this renders as <h1>, <h2>, ... <h6>.

name: text
description: The label text for the CTA button.

name: letterSpacing
description: Letter spacing for the button text. Example: { value: "0.05", unit: "em" }.

name: fontFamily
description: Font family for the text. Example: "Inter, sans-serif".

name: url
description: The URL to the user's profile or page on this platform. Example: "https://twitter.com/username".

name: IButtonBlockData
description: Data model for button blocks.

name: button
description: Represents a button block type.

name: color
description: Optional custom or brand color override for the icon. Accepts CSS hex or rgb(a) string. Example: "#1da1f2".

name: textDecoration
description: Text decoration for the button text. Example: "underline", "line-through", "none".
